TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SpeakStartedEventArgs extends System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptEventArgs

remarks.format:
## Remarks 執行個體<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakStartedEventArgs>時，會建立<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>物件引發<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>事件。 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>引發<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>事件開始就使用任何的提示時<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>，或<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>方法。
<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakStartedEventArgs>類別沒有屬性，而且不傳回資料來源<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>事件。 它可讓應用程式作者撰寫事件處理常式，如<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>事件。
